network_overview: The capture shows healthy 5G N4 (PFCP) and 4G Diameter control-plane traffic between SMF/UPF and HSS/MME nodes. All observed PFCP and Diameter transactions completed successfully with standard response codes; no user-plane or voice protocols are present at this observation point.

observations.finding: PFCP Session Establishment/Modification/Deletion exchanges complete successfully

observations.evidence: Cause 2001 (DIAMETER_SUCCESS) returned for sessions ending in 07de45c5 and 07de45c0

observations.finding: One Diameter transaction rejected with DIAMETER_UNABLE_TO_DELIVER
observations.evidence: Frame 3: Cmd-272 response code 3002 for session 2fde45c0

root_causes.issue: Diameter routing failure for one subscriber session
root_causes.description: A single Diameter Update-Location request (session 2fde45c0) received DIAMETER_UNABLE_TO_DELIVER (3002), indicating the peer could not route the request to the destination HSS/AAA.
root_causes.impact: One attach/authentication attempt failed; subscriber likely denied service for this attempt.
root_causes.confidence_justification: Explicit 3002 result code observed in frame 3; no retransmission seen, so failure was definitive.

inconclusive_aspects.reason: GTP-U not observed at this 5G_CORE_UPF point
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Mirror on N3 or S1-U interface to verify GTP-U tunnels are established

inconclusive_aspects.reason: SIP, RTP, and NGAP not present in capture
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Capture on IMS P-CSCF or N2 interface for SIP and RTP
Longer capture to include PFCP Msg 1/2 for path verification

recommendations.action: Investigate Diameter routing for peer 10.47.54.22 to resolve DIAMETER_UNABLE_TO_DELIVER
recommendations.rationale: One explicit 3002 failure indicates potential peer mis-configuration or HSS unreachable

recommendations.action: Enable GTP-U capture on N3 interface to confirm user-plane bearer establishment
recommendations.rationale: PFCP success alone does not guarantee GTP-U tunnels are forwarding traffic

session_analysis.signaling_health: Control-plane signaling is largely successful; 1 out of 8 Diameter transactions failed with routing error, all PFCP transactions accepted.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: Not observable at this capture point (no GTP-U seen).
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: PFCP session IDs correlate with successful Diameter sessions, indicating SMF/UPF resources were provisioned for attached subscribers.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant SMF
    participant UPF
    participant HSS
    Note over SMF,HSS: 5G N4 + 4G Diameter
    SMF->>UPF: PFCP Session Estab Req (Msg-50)
    UPF->>SMF: PFCP Session Estab Resp (Msg-51) cause=1
    SMF->>UPF: PFCP Session Modif Req (Msg-52)
    UPF->>SMF: PFCP Session Modif Resp (Msg-53) cause=1
    SMF->>HSS: Diameter ULR (Cmd-272)
    HSS->>SMF: Diameter ULA (Cmd-272) result=2001
    SMF->>HSS: Diameter ULR (Cmd-272)
    HSS->>SMF: Diameter ULA (Cmd-272) result=3002
    SMF->>UPF: PFCP Session Delet Req (Msg-56)
    UPF->>SMF: PFCP Session Delet Resp (Msg-57) cause=1
